item.title: !TEXMAP Language Extension
item.description: This page contains my interpretation of the official LDraw document. Information on this page may be wrong. Official LDraw document Line Syntax: 0 !TEXMAP (START | NEXT) (PLANAR | CYLINDRICAL | SPHERICAL) x1 y1 z1 x2 y2 z2 x3 y3 z3 [a] [b] <pngfile> [GLOSSMAP pngfile] 0 !: <geometry1> <geometry2> 0 !TEXMAP FALLBACK <geometry3> 0 !TEXMAP END Planar Mapping There are three points specified: P1(x1, y1, z1), P2(x2, y2, z2) and P3(x3, y3, z3).
